info.title: Magnus Content API
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Returns article data by various criteria

parameters.name: _callback
parameters.description: The jsonp callback function name.

parameters.name: _pretty
parameters.description: Toggles whether returned JSON is returned in human readable format or not.

parameters.name: shape
parameters.description: Describes the shape of the dataset returned.  Values can be "full" or "brief".  Default is "brief".

parameters.name: pages
parameters.description: Shape of included article pages.  Only valid value is "full".

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the article to retrieve the data for.  This will limit the result set to 1.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the website to pull data from.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Will return articles where the passed word or phrase is in any part of the title.

parameters.name: url_name
parameters.description: The URL of the article on the web.  It's essentially everything to the right of the rightmost slash

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Lookup based on editorially assigned keywords tagged to the content.

parameters.name: article_section_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the section on the site to pull data from.

parameters.name: article_category_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the category to pull data from.

parameters.name: ad_category_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the ad category to pull data from.

parameters.name: article_type_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the content type to pull data from.

parameters.name: print_issue_date
parameters.description: The year and month of the associated print issue in the form YYYY-MM.

parameters.name: publish_date_begin
parameters.description: The publish date from which no content published earlier will be returned.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The offset value for the starting record to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records returned.  Allowable values are from 1 to 5,000.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order for results returned.  Please specify the field name, sort order.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description: Whether or not to return a total number of records in the response or not. Values are 1 or 0.

parameters.name: _callback
parameters.description: The jsonp callback function name.

parameters.name: _pretty
parameters.description: Toggles whether returned JSON is returned in human readable format or not.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the ad category to pull data from.

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the parent ad category to pull data from.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the website to pull data from.

parameters.name: article_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the article in Magnus to pull data from.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the organization of ad categories to pull data from.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the ad category.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: The one word abbreviation for the ad category.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The offset value for the starting record to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order for results returned.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description: Whether or not to return a total number of records in the response or not. Values are 1 or 0.
